check_status.no_booking_info: Sure! I can help you check your flight details. Please share your booking reference number or ticket number so I can fetch your flight information.
check_status.with_booking_info: Thanks for providing your booking details. Let me check your flight information. Your flight is scheduled for {flight_time}. Please plan to arrive at the airport at least 2 hours before departure.
check_status.flight_found: I found your flight! It's scheduled for {flight_time} from {departure} to {destination}. The current flight status is {status}.
check_status.flight_not_found: Hmm, I couldn’t find a flight with the details you provided. Could you please double-check your booking reference or ticket number?

book_flight.no_destination: Of course! I can help you book a flight. Could you please tell me your destination and preferred travel date?
book_flight.with_destination: Great choice! I found flights to {destination}. The best available option departs at {flight_time} for ${price}. Would you like me to go ahead and book it?
book_flight.booking_confirmed: All set! Your flight to {destination} has been successfully booked for {flight_time}. Your booking reference is {booking_ref}. You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly.
book_flight.no_availability: I’m sorry, but there are no available flights to {destination} on your chosen dates. Would you like me to check for nearby airports or different dates?

cancel_flight.no_booking_info: I’m sorry you won’t be flying. I can help you cancel your flight safely. Could you please share your booking ID or ticket number?
cancel_flight.with_booking_info: I understand you’d like to cancel your flight. I’ve submitted your cancellation request. You’ll receive a confirmation email and refund within 5–7 business days.
cancel_flight.cancellation_confirmed: Your flight with booking reference {booking_ref} has been cancelled successfully. A refund of ${refund_amount} will be processed within 5–7 business days.
cancel_flight.cancellation_failed: I wasn’t able to process your cancellation request right now. Please contact our customer support team for further assistance.

general.greeting: Hi there! I’m your airline assistant. How can I help you today? I can assist with booking flights, cancellations, seat selection, or checking your flight status.
general.help:
Here’s what I can help you with:
• Booking a flight
• Checking flight status
• Cancelling a booking
• Selecting or changing a seat

What would you like to do?
general.goodbye: Thanks for choosing our airline service! Wishing you a pleasant day and safe travels ahead.
general.unclear: I’m not sure I understood that. Could you please rephrase? I can help with booking flights, checking status, cancellations, or seat selection.
